nodes.bodyText:
i think it's a little confusing why we support multiple names without a bit of explanation: This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters Suggested change * Returns names of metric servers supported by this factory. * Returns names of metric servers supported by this factory. * *

Multiple names are useful for enabling a pair of span and metric exporters using the same * name, while still having separate names for enabling them individually.
